fields.Transcription: Wami uhiriwa Imouda. Wami washi Nioumachoi. Wami mwanashiyoni. Am na maha shirini na mbili. Am msomo lycee ya Nioumachoi. Am fanya yi BACI maha uno neheka tsipara yi BACI am tsaho na fanya leha ya shingereza de mana leha iyo unidjipviwa mana iyo de idjoulihanawo piya na idunia aina pvahano wendawo. Iyo de iluha irogoleshehanawo iyo de mana tsidjipviwa na iyo. Na wami nidjopvendza neheka tsipara yi BACI na some bushini mana bushini uho de wonawo vwazuri nidjopara musomo mwema musomo muzuri de mana am tsaho nende bushini uho. Wami tsena neheka tsitsi na hazi tsikantsi zangu tsisi na ndrongo nifanyawo wami pvendza nitembe niwone wandru mdjini, langandze na wanayangu, nihadisi.
fields.Translation: My name is Imouda. I am from Nioumachoi. I am a student. I am 22. I study at Nioumachoi high school. I will take the BAC this year. If I succeed in the BAC I want to study the English language because that is the language I will be happy studying. It is the language that is spoken everywhere in the world and that everything is done in. It is the language that everyone speaks and understands that is why I am happy with that one. And if I succeed in the BAC I want to study in Madagascar because in Madagascar one can see that I will find a good education, that is why I want to study there. If I dont have any work or anything to do I also like to take a walk and visit people in the village and spend time with my family and talk.
Demographics: 27,200 in Comoros (2000). Population total all countries: 28,700.

fields.Geneaology: "[ Niger-Congo, Atlantic-Congo, Volta-Congo, Benue-Congo, Bantoid, Southern, Narrow Bantu, Central, G, Swahili (G.44) ]"
